Player.Name: L. Messi
Player.description: The top ranked dribbler in FIFA 17 with 96. The Barcelona right wing is the 2nd ranked player overall in FIFA 17.

Player.Name: C. Ronaldo
Player.description: The top ranked player in FIFA 17. Cristiano Ronaldo has 92 Pace, 92 Shooting, 91 Dribbling and is as strong as an ox with 80 Physicality.

Player.Name: K. Benzema
Player.description: Still a destructive force in front of goal, has the ability to win any match. His 84 Shooting will be a nightmare for defenders to cope with.

Player.Name: P. Pogba
Player.description: A center mid who will bolster any midfield. Still a destructive force in front of goal, Paul Pogba boasts 87 Dribbling to go along with his 87 Physicality.

Player.Name: J. Neymar
Player.description: Incredibly skillful with the ability to turn a game in an instant. The Barcelona left wing has the 2nd highest Dribbling attribute in FIFA 17 with 95
